text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Province of Latina | native_name = | native_name_lang = it | settlement_type = Province | image_skyline = Prefettura di latina.jpg | image_alt = Palazzo del Governo, province headquarters. | image_caption = Palazzo del Governo, province headquarters. | image_flag = Flag of Latina.png | flag_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = Latina in Italy.svg | map_alt = Map with the province of Latina in Italy | map_caption = Map with the province of Latina, in red, in Italy | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Lazio | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Latina | parts_type = Comuni | parts_style = para | p1 = 33 | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = President | leader_name = Eleonora Della Penna | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2256.16 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 574891 | population_as_of = January 2017 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 04100 Latina, 04010-04032 | area_code_type = Telephone prefix | area_code = 06, 0771, 0773 | iso_code = | registration_plate = LT | blank_name_sec1 = ISTAT | blank_info_sec1 = 059 | website = Official website | footnotes = | coordinates = }} The Province of Latina () is a province in the Lazio region of Central Italy. Its capital is the city of Latina. ==History== The province of Latina was created in December of 1934 with the name of Littoria. ==Geography== The province of Latina has an area of , the smallest province of the Lazio region. The province is in the southwest of the Lazio region. It borders to the north with the Frosinone province, to the northwest and west with the Metropolitan City of Rome, to the southeast with the Campania region (Caserta), and to the south with the Tyrrhenian Sea (Mediterranean Sea). The highest mountain in the province is Monte Petrella (), with an altitude of . ==Population== In 2017, there are 574,891 persons living in the province, for a population density of inhabitants/km². The comune with fewest people living in it is Campodimele with 622 inhabitants. ===Main comuni=== The following table shows the 10 comuni with more inhabitants with their population, and their area and altitude.
